title: I just had a ranked game where 5 people remade the game?

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
The Shyvanna apparently quit after blitz was taking jg, and then rejoined to vote
Is that allowed...? She didn't start afk.

replies.body:
She would have disconnected within the timeframe for the vote to be cast (+ a death didn't happen while she _was_ connected). When she rejoined, it would have been just as the vote was cast, and enough votes would have already been cast for a successful remake. 

You don't have to start AFK, as it is quite common for players to DC in the first few minutes of the game (while taking jungle, while waiting to leash, etc) and /remake is designed to take this into account as well.
